    Date: 1-08-2017

                         Both the appellants namely Amar Nath Mahto and Usha

        Devi have been found guilty for an offence punishable underSection

        304B/34of the I.P.C. vide judgment of conviction dated 09.09.2016

        and each one has been sentenced to undergo rigorous imprisonment

        for 10 years with a further direction to set off in terms ofSection 428of the Cr.P.C. with regard to custodial period spent during course of

        trial vide order of sentence dated 16.09.2016 passed by the Additional

        Sessions Judge-4th, Patna in Sessions Trial No.1459 of 2013.
